messages.title: Who will put Solihull first?
messages.content: Residents are backing Lorely Burt to stand up for Solihull as our MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lorely has delivered a bill to Parliament to protect our precious green spaces and parkland.
She has fought to protect local health services and challenged Gordon Brown on polyclinics.
Lorely fought the closure of Solihull maternity unit and helped reinstate full maternity services at Solihull Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's so close here in Solihull. Labour can't win here - Lorely Burt is the best choice.

issues.health: Lorely has fought to protect local health services and challenged Gordon Brown on polyclinics.

housing.content: Lorely delivered on her election promise to introduce a bill to Parliament to protect our precious green spaces and parkland.

endorsements.endorsement: Lorely has been a strong voice for us in Parliament and locally. I'm backing Lorely because she speaks out on the issues that matter most to me.
Lorely has the real life experience we need from our MP. She understands the problems we face because she's lived them. Lorely always puts local people first.
Lorely really cares about young people. She listens carefully, gives strong encouragement to all, and advises us to work hard and aim high.
I'm looking forward to voting for the first time this year. Lorely's exactly what Solihull needs.

quotes.text: Lorely is doing more both in the constituency and in Parliament than her previous members afforded the town for years.
Lorely Burt has a winning personality
Lorely Burt, our Lib Dem MP has done a first class job
For Lorely to take the seat by 279 votes and retain the seat is most significant and reflects the trust in her.
